meanings.definition: A member of the lowest order of the British nobility.
meanings.sent1: The barons in the story were known for their kindness and generosity.
meanings.sent2: The barons of the kingdom gathered for a grand feast.
meanings.sent3: The barons decided to have a friendly competition to see who could bake the best cake.
meanings.sent4: The barons of the land stood tall and proud, like ancient trees in a forest.
meanings.sent5: The barons' colorful attire made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: The local barons of industry were respected for their success.
meanings.sent2: The tech barons revolutionized the way people communicate.
meanings.sent3: The barons of the business world met for a high-stakes poker game.
meanings.sent4: The barons of innovation paved the way for future generations.
meanings.sent5: The barons' influence extended far beyond their companies.

meanings.definition: A large and imposing house or mansion.
meanings.sent1: The old barons on the hill overlooked the entire town.
meanings.sent2: The barons along the coast were breathtaking in their grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The barons of the neighborhood hosted a lavish garden party.
meanings.sent4: The barons of architecture designed the most magnificent buildings.
meanings.sent5: The barons' estates were like something out of a fairy tale.
